text: Richard Henry Pitt Mason (3 March 1934 – 27 June 2009), also known as R.H.P. Mason, was an Australian academic, historian and Japanologist. He was a professor at the Australian National University in Canberra.Library of Congress Authority File, Mason, R.H.P.; retrieved 2012-111-8. ==Selected works== In an overview of writings by and about Mason, OCLC/WorldCat lists roughly 10+ works in 50+ publications in 5 languages and 1,900+ library holdings.
